text: Ikhfanul Alam (born, 17 February 1992 in Indonesia), is an Indonesian professional footballer who plays for Liga 2 club Badak Lampung. He is also a Police Brigadier 1st Class in the Indonesian Police. == Honours == ===Club=== Arema * Indonesia President's Cup: 2019 ==References== Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Arema F.C. players Category:Badak Lampung F.C. title: Ikhfanul Alam
